title: Hong Kong holds election after deadly fire kills many people
snippets: The Legislative Council election is seen as a test of public sentiment following a deadly fire.
Voters headed to the polls Sunday to elect members of Hong Kong's Legislative Council. Officials have tried to boost turnout amid public anger over a recent fire that killed 159 people.
Hong Kong election turnout in focus amid anger over deadly fire Reuters
Authorities struggle to win mandate for ‚Äòpatriots only‚Äô system of governance as only 31.9% of voters cast ballots
The arrest was part of a crackdown on speech that the authorities say is inciting hatred of the government. Critics say officials are silencing calls for accountability.
Hong Kong, with some of the world‚Äôs highest housing costs and inequality, must now figure out how to help thousands of residents who lost friends, family and homes.

summary: On December 7, 2025, Hong Kong held Legislative Council elections amid public anger over a recent fire that killed 159 people. Voter turnout was 31.9%, despite efforts by officials to encourage participation under the "patriots only" governance system. Authorities have also arrested individuals accused of inciting hatred of the government, while critics allege suppression of calls for accountability. Thousands remain affected by the fire.

title: Lando Norris wins his first Formula 1 world championship
snippets: Norris finished third behind Max Verstappen in final race to deliver McLaren its first world drivers' crown since 2008.

Red Bull driver and defending champion Max Verstappen won the race with Norris placing third, which allowed Norris to finish two points ahead of Verstappen in the season-long standings.
Lando Norris became the Formula 1 world drivers' champion for the first time after securing the 2025 title at Sunday's season finale in Abu Dhabi.

summary: Lando Norris won his first Formula 1 world drivers' championship by finishing third in the 2025 season-ending Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. Although Red Bull's Max Verstappen won the race, Norris secured enough points to finish two ahead of Verstappen in the overall standings. This marks McLaren's first drivers' title since 2008 and makes Norris the 11th Briton to win the championship.

title: Benin soldiers try to take power but are stopped by government

The state TV and radio signals, briefly disrupted, were restored.
